turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I was looking to get a drink espresso from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size espresso would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, no. I would like to get the iced cappuccino with cold foam. Venti ice for the size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was looking at the dinner from the Starbucks on 31st and Dogan in Temple, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what was the cross street again?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a venti iced cappuccino with cold foam with a splash of 2% milk to be picked up at the starbucks at 31st dogan, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. No, thank you. Have a good day.
